entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is the mother of Dudley and Harry. She expresses concern about school food.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the father of Dudley and Harry. He claims to have never gone hungry at Smeltings.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the son of Petunia and Uncle Vernon. He is large and grins when asked if he gets enough food.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the son of Petunia and Uncle Vernon. He reminds Dudley to use the magic word.

entities.name: smeltings
entities.description: Smeltings is a school that Uncle Vernon attended where he never went hungry.

entities.name: mrs dursley
entities.description: Mrs Dursley is the wife of Uncle Vernon. She gives a small scream when Harry uses magic.
